phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
Siegrain and Jellal were a single person!
Then, Etherion was unleashed, and the true form of the Tower of Heaven was revealed.
I want her to be her usual self when she wakes up from this nightmare.
I wonder if Natsu and Erza are okay?
Because they are both Fairy Tail wizards.
All we can do now is believe in them.
More than I have ever been!
I will end this in an instant!
I will send you to Hell regretting the fact that you ever stood up again!
One thing I know is that I can be real stubborn.
If you are going to do it, then give me your best shot!
You scared a breakin' the tower, so you are holding back?
That are not going to work on me, bub!
You are not going to talk so big for long, you brat!
Dazzling Blaze of the Fire Dragon!
The tower I spent 8 years constructing...
You will not get away with it!
What is with this magical power?
The shadows are extending backwards to the light source!
Fall into the infinite darkness, dragon wizard!
Will you let me be killed as well?
You need a body to resurrect Zeref, correct?
It is a general requirement that the body be of a wizard
about as powerful as one of the Ten Wizard Saints.
But at this point, it does not have to be you anymore.
What is this unsettled feeling I have...
They call that throwing away your life, Simon!
This does not change a thing!
Because there is no way anyone is leaving this tower alive!
The crazy bastard is eating Etherion!
Ethernano is fused with other elements than fire, you know!
Did you seriously think you could power up
by eating such powerful magic energy instead of flames?
That kind of peabrained thinking will lead you to your own downfall!
You will never be able to catch me at this speed!
I am making a kingdom of freedom!
Zeref whispered to me in my pain and fear...
Zeref and I will create a truly free kingdom together!
And you will make it by taking away other people's freedom?
Only ones with the will to change the world can make history!
You plan to destroy the tower as well?
This time I will finish it in 5.
There is no such thing as freedom for somebody taken over by ghosts!
That is got to be Natsu.
But, is that going to be okay?
Or so I would like to think.
But he sure is going wild there...
The battle I have been fighting these 8 years is now over.
I can feel a terrible magical power coming from that light!
Could Etherion be going out of control?
Keeping that great amount of magical power in one place can never be stable for long.
A turbulent vortex of magical power with no where else to go will burst out,
We will be caught in it as well!
What about Sister and the others still inside?
This is not about who is saving who anymore!
We are all going to be wiped out together!
Magical power strong enough to deform the container...
That is even more destructive power than I had imagined.
Even if we get outside, we will be caught up in the explosion.
There is no way I will give up.
Now it is my turn to save you, Natsu.
But it is impossible to hold it back.
The tremendous amount of magical power this lacrima now stores,
will be fused into your body.
Your body will be deconstructed, and then reconstituted into Zeref's.
If I can fuse with Etherion, then can I control this power?
I have got to take the chance.
The lacrima is still accepting me.
You are putting yourself into the lacrima?
This is the only way to stop Etherion.
This tower will shortly explode as Etherion goes out of control.
But if I can fuse with Etherion and suppress it...
What are you saying, you idiot!
If you do that, you will...
Do not worry about it any more!
I will stop it for sure!
I could not have lived without Fairy Tail.
A world without my friends is unthinkable.
You are all just that important to me.
Even if it takes this body...
Natsu, take care of everyone for me.
Because I will always be by your side...
Etherion is heading up into the sky!
That is such a horrid wound...
It will be quite difficult for you to see again, yes...
I am asking you nicely so no complaining.
She is got such a pretty face, have some compassion would you?
You are not thinking of laying hands on her when she is older, are you?
You are only crying out of one eye...
I did not make an error while mixing the medicine...
I have already cried out half my tears, you see.
Natsu, it seems like our new guild is finally finished!
I cannot wait to check it out!
It is finally been rebuilt, so do not go destroying it all of a sudden, okay?
Hey, since when have I been the type to go around destroying stuff?
Things break because Gray and Erza go crazy, right?
But it is usually you who starts the fights, Natsu.
So it is all my fault?!
